message: It's the second time for me that the KBX icon in Firefox disappears from the bottom bar. The first time I had to reinstall firefox. Reinstalling the extension only didn't work. Has anybody experienced that and found a remedy?
Ouch, I have not had this experience
@loic Thanks for the Lucky Star, but alas I too have had unique experiences as well ... just not the disappearing KBX icon

When such a experience happens to me once I say : "This has not happened. Let's take a coffee". The second time it happens I say "I shouldn't drink so much coffee. Instead let's bother people on convore".
@loic, I will double check the FF KBX and see if I can see what would be causing your experiences.
Does KBX add an icon to the status bar?
yes , on the bar that is called "add-on" bar on Firefox
The Rapture does happen! It mystically stold my KBX icon again
Is the add-on bar still there, but the icon gone, or is the whole add-on bar  gone?
the add-on bar was still there but lost the icon.
